publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2386.1 David Whitton: Association of Harris Tweed Weaversâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2386) in the name of Alasdair Allan, insert at end "and calls on the new association to support calls for all entries to the new national tartan register to provide a piece of woven cloth in support of their application, to help boost the weaving industry." Supported by: Jackie Baillie*, Sarah Boyack*, Karen Gillon*, Jim Tolson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Elaine Murray*, Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*, Marilyn Livingstone*
